# R for Data Science assessment

```{r}
#import and load the required packages
install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Reading the gapminder into a tibble

```{r}
gapminder <- read_csv("gapminder_clean.csv")
gapminder
```
## Filtering and plotting the data
```{r}
gapminder_filtered <- filter(gapminder, Year == 1962)
gapminder_filtered

gapminder_plot <- ggplot(gapminder_filtered, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = `CO2 emissions (metric tons per capita)`)) +
  geom_point()
 
gapminder_plot
```
